section.title: Introduction
section.para: The &product; on Windows application has most of the features of its Linux/UNIX counterpart, and comes with the same text-based configuration. For limitations specific to the platform, refer to:

para.link: The syslog-ng Premium Edition Administrator Guide

section.para: Three distinct operation scenarios are available:
The application determines the mode of operation automatically, based on the license and the configuration file.

A lightweight client alternative to &product; for Windows, the syslog-ng Agent for Windows application can collect and forward log messages to a remote server. It comes with a graphical user interface, and it's easier to deploy to a large number of machines.

section.title: Scope
section.para: This guide contains instructions for setting up &product; (PE) as server and &agent; as client on Windows for evaluation.
In addition, basic configuration options are provided for reliable transfer protocol, macros in filenames, and storing messages in encrypted files.
